title: Duomov make dual videos with nearby iOS devices using peer-to-peer WiFi

and friend simultaneously film perspectives the same place situation. soon you stop recording, duomov automagically create single, split-screen video both you. everything be perfectly synchronized, including audio, the final result is super fun awesome!step 4: save video your camera roll /or share on favorite social networks!please feel free contact : hi@duomov.comraphael cruzeiro web siteduomov: videos nearby friends support iphone screenshotsview itunes * free * category: photo & video * released: jun 09, 2017 * version: 1.0 * size: 31.9 mb * languages: english, french, german, japanese, portuguese, spanish * seller: raphael cruzeiro * © 2017 bitdreamsrated 4+compatibility: requires ios 10.0 later. compatible iphone, ipad, ipod touch.customer ratings have received enough ratings display average the current version this application. discover share apps.follow on @appstore.discover share music, movies, tv, books, more.follow @itunes discover itunes radio stations the music love.apple 1. itunesshop learnopen menuclose menu * mac * ipad * iphone * watch * tv * music * itunes * ipod * accessories * gift cardsapple storeopen menuclose menu * find store * genius bar * workshops learning * youth programs * apple store app * refurbished clearance * financing * reuse recycling * order status * shopping help educationopen menuclose menu * apple education * shop college businessopen menuclose menu * apple business * shop businessaccountopen menuclose menu * manage apple id * apple store account * icloud.comapple valuesopen menuclose menu * accessibility * education * environment * inclusion diversity * privacy * supplier responsibility appleopen menuclose menu * apple info * newsroom * job opportunities * press info * investors * events * contact applemore ways shop: visit apple store, call 1-800--apple, find reseller.united statescopyright © 2017 apple inc. rights reserved.privacy policyterms usesales refundslegalsite map
